body: Oh yeah why does every com sec have at least one guy with the spaghetti in yellow tank tops? Cult or something??

@hdavid I could totally imagine that all happening, lol.  I honestly would like to see the sociopathic sex fiend fall in love with the woman, or actually reveal some emotional vulnerability with her, but I don't think it's going to happen especially now that he's hotwifing her to the kid. It's not really clear to me how his mommy issues are playing into the story here. It doesn't seem to be like the guy from Taste of Forbidden Fruit, where his trauma with his mom made him misogynistic and wanting to prove that all women are just whores.
@kurumixchan - Those aren't real, I made them up.  It's my opinion on how the series should end.  Sorry.
@hadavid where you read 13,14 & 15?

Chpt 15: 6 month time skip.  Husband and Wife are fucking and have a cute lovey-dovey moment about having kids.  Asshole is lighting incense at his mother's grave, it's implied that he forgives her. At restaurant, Wife is now manager, Kid is assistant manager.  Wife says she is training Kid and they are going to work on market research.  Wife drives car to same love hotel from earlier in series.  Wife and Kid start fucking.  As Wife is just about to orgasm, though bubble appears that says "Sorry Husband, my subordinate is going to make me cum..."

Here's how the series should end:
Chpt 13: Wife finally gets anal from the Asshole and gets DP from the Asshole and the Kid. Chapter ends with a text message to the Wife's phone from Husband saying his 3 month exile is over.
Chpt 14: Asshole sees message and decides to throw Husband a "welcome home party." Husband comes home to find Wife being fucked by Asshole, Kid, and two of Kid's friends.  Husband leaves room and Asshole smiles thinking he's won.  Husband comes back in with towel and bathrobe. Pulls Wife off of bed, wipes her face then kisses her, puts bathrobe on her.  Looks Asshole in the eye and declares his eternal love for his wife and asks everyone to leave.  Asshole has anime epiphany moment and realizes that he never got revenge on his mom at  all.  Everyone picks up clothes and leaves.

I would be so disappointed if the husband just lets it go after he finds out. The most thrilling aspect of this is the fact that she does so much sh*t behind his back because there is some "risk" and as she falls more and more into the rabbit hole; how she is going to explain it all to her husband or what they both do after the revelation. But if the husband just somehow tries to avoid or ignore the problem entirely then it just makes reading everything that lead up to it a waste of time. At least for the readers that came here for the plot.
